scenes.description: Koseki Bijou (Biboo) finishes her performance and tries to teleport home.
The teleportation fails, and the coins power-up scatter into the darkness.
Biboo laments the loss of the coins and decides to follow them into a mysterious screen.
Biboo arrives in a new, colorful 3D stage area.
Biboo encounters Roboco-san, who reveals she is a 'Game Master' holding a missing coin.
Biboo and Roboco-san perform 'Remote Control' as their 'battle'.

subtitles.original: Yeah! How was that?
subtitles.english: Yeah! How was that?

subtitles.original: That was the best performance ever, right?
subtitles.english: That was the best performance ever, right?

subtitles.original: Hey over there!
subtitles.english: Hey over there!

subtitles.original: You liked it, right? Hey!
subtitles.english: You liked it, right? Hey!

subtitles.original: With this, I should be able to get back to my own world.
subtitles.english: With this, I should be able to get back to my own world.

subtitles.original: Alright, ready? Beam me up, pebbles!
subtitles.english: Alright, ready? Beam me up, pebbles!

subtitles.original: Ah! Ah!
subtitles.english: Ah! Ah!

subtitles.original: Why is it...?
subtitles.english: Why is it...?

subtitles.original: No!
subtitles.english: No!

subtitles.original: Guys, where are you going?
subtitles.english: Guys, where are you going?

subtitles.original: Dang it.
subtitles.english: Dang it.

subtitles.original: Well, according to video game logic,
subtitles.english: Well, according to video game logic,

subtitles.original: this must mean I must now go on an epic quest to find the coins or something.
subtitles.english: this must mean I must now go on an epic quest to find the coins or something.

subtitles.original: But I don't have time for that!
subtitles.english: But I don't have time for that!

subtitles.original: I need the coins back to get home! No!
subtitles.english: I need the coins back to get home! No!

subtitles.original: Huh? Huh? Oh, what's this?
subtitles.english: Huh? Huh? Oh, what's this?

subtitles.original: I mean, I came out through there, so
subtitles.english: I mean, I came out through there, so

subtitles.original: maybe this will take me... you know, on my next step of my quest?
subtitles.english: maybe this will take me... you know, on my next step of my quest?

subtitles.original: Well, better than being stuck here. So...
subtitles.english: Well, better than being stuck here. So...

subtitles.original: Let's go!
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: Huh? Huh? I'm not back in my world? Eh?
subtitles.english: Huh? Huh? I'm not back in my world? Eh?

subtitles.original: ここどこ？
subtitles.english: Where am I?

subtitles.original: 待ってたよ、ビブー。
subtitles.english: I've been waiting for you, Biboo.

subtitles.original: Robocosan Joins the Battle!
subtitles.english: Robocosan Joins the Battle!

subtitles.original: Eh? Eh? Roboco-senpai!
subtitles.english: Eh? Eh? Roboco-senpai!

subtitles.original: 探しているのは、これ？
subtitles.english: Is this what you're looking for?

subtitles.original: Ah! Coin! The coin!
subtitles.english: Ah! Coin! The coin!

subtitles.original: MISSION: Reclaim the scattered coins from each stage's Game Master!
subtitles.english: MISSION: Reclaim the scattered coins from each stage's Game Master!

subtitles.original: これがないと元の世界に戻れないんでしょ？
subtitles.english: Without this, you can't get back to your world, right?

subtitles.original: でも、そうはさせない。
subtitles.english: But I won't let that happen.

subtitles.original: ゲームマスターである僕たちから、
subtitles.english: From us Game Masters...

subtitles.original: すべて取り戻せるかな？
subtitles.english: ...can you take them all back?

subtitles.original: Wait, really? Can I not go back... wait...
subtitles.english: Wait, really? Can I not go back... wait...

subtitles.original: とにかく！このコインが欲しければ、僕と勝負だ！
subtitles.english: Anyway! If you want this coin, challenge me!

subtitles.original: A match?
subtitles.english: A match?

subtitles.original: そう！ Yes！ 格闘ゲームで勝負だ！
subtitles.english: So! Yes! Let's settle this with a fighting game!

subtitles.original: All right! I won't lose!
subtitles.english: All right! I won't lose!

subtitles.original: Wait, what? No!
subtitles.english: Wait, what? No!

subtitles.original: リモコン
subtitles.english: Remote Control

subtitles.original: L & R & UP & DOWN & B & B & A & B & S(tart)
subtitles.english: L & R & UP & DOWN & B & B & A & B & S(tart)

subtitles.original: L & R & Dash & & B & B & A & B & S(tart)
subtitles.english: L & R & Dash & & B & B & A & B & S(tart)

subtitles.original: L & R & Dash & & B & B & A & B & STOP
subtitles.english: L & R & Dash & & B & B & A & B & STOP

subtitles.original: L & R & Dash & & B & B & A & B & TALK
subtitles.english: L & R & Dash & & B & B & A & B & TALK

subtitles.original: L & R & Dash & & B & B & A & B & S(tart)
subtitles.english: L & R & Dash & & B & B & A & B & S(tart)

subtitles.original: これが私をリモートでコントロールする機械です
subtitles.english: This is the machine that controls me remotely.

subtitles.original: 少し歪な形しておりますが使えます
subtitles.english: It's a bit of an odd shape, but it works.

subtitles.original: UP SIDE DOWN LEFT RIGHT
subtitles.english: UP SIDE DOWN LEFT RIGHT

subtitles.original: UP SIDE DOWN LEFT RIGHT
subtitles.english: UP SIDE DOWN LEFT RIGHT

subtitles.original: L R & Dash & B B A B S
subtitles.english: L R & Dash & B B A B S

subtitles.original: UP SIDE DOWN LEFT RIGHT
subtitles.english: UP SIDE DOWN LEFT RIGHT

subtitles.original: L R & Dash & B B A B S
subtitles.english: L R & Dash & B B A B S

subtitles.original: もうちょっとで外に出られるのにな
subtitles.english: I was so close to being able to go outside...

subtitles.original: どうしてもうまくいかね まだ まだ 足りない
subtitles.english: No matter what, it doesn't go well. It's still not enough.

subtitles.original: SIT DOWN! PLEASE!
subtitles.english: SIT DOWN! PLEASE!

subtitles.original: FEEDBACKに身を固めて
subtitles.english: Hardened by feedback...

subtitles.original: 巡る 巡る TURN IT ROUND
subtitles.english: Round and round, turn it round.

subtitles.original: 唸り上げてモーター状態
subtitles.english: Roaring like a motor...

subtitles.original: 踊る 踊る DANCING NIGHT
subtitles.english: Dancing, dancing night.

subtitles.original: MASH UP！ 溢れ出なく 分かる
subtitles.english: Mash up! Overflowing, I understand.

subtitles.original: 声を上げて SINGING NOW
subtitles.english: Raise your voice, singing now.

subtitles.original: あの子よりも上手く歌いたい
subtitles.english: I want to sing better than that girl.

subtitles.original: これが僕をリモートで操縦できる機械です
subtitles.english: This is the machine that can control me remotely.

subtitles.original: 説明書は紛失しておりますが使えます
subtitles.english: The instruction manual is missing, but it works.
